page.title: 09Shopping-Llanhari area
page.content: A questionnaire survey was undertaken in the shopping centres at Llanhari and Talbot Green in order to study local shopping patterns. In Llanhari,50% of those questioned were local people,whilst the remainder were from the immediate area.All those questioned were shopping for food and drink;the majority used shops in Llanhari at least once a fortnight.83% of those questioned also used shops at Talbot Green to purchase other goods. 47% of those interviewed in Talbot Green were local people,20% were from Pontyclun or Brynsadler and 33% from further afield.47% of those questioned were shopping for food and drink,26% were there to buy clothes,footwear or other household goods.73% visit the shopping centre at least once a week. Cardiff is the main alternative centre
